des:
Kohler® Konnect skill works with your Amazon Alexa to elevate life's everyday tasks and routines in the bathroom and kitchen by providing hands-free voice control.
Enhance your filtered water experience at home by maximizing your filters’ life. This feature reminds you when to replace your filters and eliminates the guess work.

With Alexa and Kohler Konnect skill, you can streamline and enrich your daily routines in the most frequently used rooms in your home, the bathroom and kitchen. Add convenience by giving simple voice commands. 

To get started:
- Click the ENABLE button or say "Alexa, enable Kohler Konnect skill."
- Ensure your Kohler Konnect product is connected. For more information, visit http://KOHLER.com/kohlerkonnect.
- Enter your Kohler Konnect WiFi Connect username and password to link your account.

Here are just a few of the ways Kohler Konnect skill and Alexa can work together to bring voice control to your KOHLER® plumbing products:

SENSATE® FAUCET
- Alexa, ask Kohler to dispense one cup of water.
- Alexa, ask Kohler to turn off my kitchen faucet.

DTV+™ SHOWER
- Alexa, ask Kohler to turn on my shower preset two.
- Alexa, ask Kohler to set my shower to 105 degrees.

AQUIFER
- Alexa, ask Kohler to check my water usage
- Alexa, ask Kohler how much water I’ve used
- Alexa, ask Kohler what’s my filter life 

Conversational:
To utilize conversations skills “Alexa, Ask Kohler” to enter the Konnect Skills environment, following Alexa’s response you will have the ability to give a specific action:
 “Turn on my kitchen faucet”
 “Dispense one cup of water from kitchen faucet”


For a full list of features and voice prompts, visit http://KOHLER.com/KohlerKonnectHelp.

Visit http://KOHLER.com/KohlerKonnect or call Kohler Customer Care at 800-4KOHLER (800-456-4537), M-F 8am-6pm CT.
